rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with a reception area. Aligned with the main road as per Vastu principles for positive energy.
Open-plan living space with colonial architectural elements such as woodwork and high ceilings. Adjacent to the central courtyard for natural light.
Functional kitchen area located near the dining area. Vastu-compliant location at the south-east corner of the ground floor.
Adjacent to the living room and kitchen, optimized for family gatherings. Natural lighting from the courtyard enhances ambience.
Cozy home theater space located at the north-west portion of the ground floor, ensuring minimal sound disturbances and alignment with Vastu for relaxation.
Private master bedroom situated in a quiet section of the bungalow. Includes an ensuite bathroom and closet space for storage.
A compact guest bathroom serving as an auxiliary to the living area on the ground floor.
An open courtyard at the center of the bungalow, promoting natural ventilation and light. Serves as a communal space that connects various rooms.

openings.description: Provides entry into the bungalow. Aligned with the auspicious east-west axis as per Vastu.
Strategically placed windows ensure ample natural lighting and ventilation throughout the bungalow. Some are positioned to face east or north for better Vastu compliance.
Functional interior doors connecting rooms; designed with colonial style detailing.
